item.title: We're Not A Console...Yet...
item.description: This week on Geeks in Progress: Batman fights Superman, rumors of Playstation 4.5 and Nintendo NX abound, Microsoft wants to cooperate on cross-platform play, The Division breaks sales records, and more!

item.title: Mikey, Just Keep Pressing B.
item.description: This week on Sunshine and Frank: Matt and Kaia go to Comic-Con, Chris gets hands-on time with the Oculus Rift, Star Citizen releases landing and planetside footage, Kaia plays Hyrule Warriors, and much more!

item.title: Our Little Podcast!
item.description: ###Our Little Podcast! Join Frank and the crew on our first podcast as we talk about Oculus, MMO’s, Mech Warrior Online, and Star Wars!
